Class AdjustmentToolPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • ly.img.android.pesdk.ui.panels.AbstractToolPanel
      • ly.img.android.pesdk.ui.panels.AdjustmentToolPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSourceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener<AdjustOption>, SeekSlider.OnSeekBarChangeListener

    public class AdjustmentToolPanel
extends AbstractToolPanel
implements SeekSlider.OnSeekBarChangeListener, DataSourceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener<AdjustOption>
    Tool view to control brightness getSettingsModel
